organisations.name: Charitable organizations
organisations.description: In our database you will find a list of verified foundations with which we cooperate. You can check what they do, who they help and what they need.

organisations.name: Local collections
organisations.description: We support local collections organized by individual people who care about the good of the community in which they live. You can organize such a collection yourself and help those who are closest to you.
